nationFound() - Static method in class NationMania.core.Round
Called only if the player succeeded to find the hidden nation.
Updates the total score with the score the player earned this round, and increase the nubmer of states discovered.
NationMania.core - package NationMania.core
NationMania.core is incharge of gameplay and back-end of UI.
NationMania.db - package NationMania.db
NationMania.db is incharge of communicating with the DB, connecting and executing queries
NationMania.parsing - package NationMania.parsing
NationMania.parsing is incharge of updating the DB via Yago Repo.
NationMania.ui - package NationMania.ui
NationMania.ui is incharge of drawing User Interface and Handling user input.
nationName - Variable in class NationMania.parsing.YagoEntryNation
 
Nations - Class in NationMania.core
Static class holds list of all the states in the DB, and the functions related to their randomization algorithm.
The nations list will be filled only on startup, unless a DB update will be preformed.

newGame - Variable in class NationMania.ui.MainMenu

nextFact - Static variable in class NationMania.core.Game

NUM_BINS - Static variable in class NationMania.core.SortedFacts
